title: I am quitting this game moving to Dota 2 for one simple reason
body:
League of Legends is dogshit for anyone on Asia who isn't Korean or Chinese.

I stopped playing League last month due to the incredibly high ping of almost 200 I receive on EuW (which is arguably the closest to SEA).

League has no  intentions of making this a quality game for anyone from another Asian country and as it stands I cannot play on either of the Korean or Chinese server due to those being restricted to their citizens.

As much as I don't mind playing this game since I've been doing incredibly well with a constant 70%+ winrate through Iron and bronze, your third party servers on Garena suck dick to say the least.

Even though I get 1/3rd the ping there when compared to EuW, and what's made a huge difference to my playstyle, the servers have no real moderation due to being handled by a third party and far many more trolls who outright verbal abuse players for pleasure because no fucking moderation exists and one gets away with anything not picked up by the automated chat bot.

I honestly do not prefer the slow paced game Dota 2 is. It feels even outdated and unpolished but I'd rather play that instead since they have better servers for the entire fucking continent with active moderation.

If you guys thought EUW had trolls you'll should play on the third party Garena Singapore server. I will be back if League ever starts to give a shit about Asia but until then trying to get a low ping lol experience had been depressing to say the least.
